list.en: I decide to get my pants altered.
I want to buy a bottle of contact Lens solution.
list.cn: 我想买一瓶隐形眼镜护理液。

list.en: It's made of sapphire.
Is this opal?
The purple matches you.
I'm afraid the shirt is too large for me.
list.cn: 恐怕这件衬衫我穿太大了。

list.en: What size, please?
What is your waist measurement?
You look really nice in blue.
Which color do you think suits me best?
list.cn: 你认为哪种颜色最适合我?

list.en: This brand of shampoo is my favorite.
list.cn: 这个牌子的洗发水是我最喜欢的。

list.en: I bought a brow pencil yesterday.
This is an amber necklace.
Do you think this blouse really suits me?
list.cn: 你觉得这件衬衫真的适合我吗?

list.en: The waist is too high.
Foaming cleansers are gentle enough for your skin.
list.cn: 泡沫洗面奶对你的皮肤很温和。

list.en: I think this type of color is a good match with it.
list.cn: 我认为这种颜色和它很相配。

list.en: Nylon is a man made fibre.
I want to buy some jewelry.
Is this dress in style?
Would you show me this pair of jade earrings?
list.cn: 请给我看看这对玉耳环好吗?

list.en: How about an inch longer?
Is this the latest fashion?
How much is this black mascara?
list.cn: 这只黑色睫毛膏多少钱?

list.en: I need to get some contact lenses.
I'd like a visible whitening mask.
list.cn: 我想要一个可见的美白面膜。

list.en: Can you recommend an engagement ring to me?
list.cn: 你能给我推荐一枚订婚戒指吗?

list.en: Can you help to advise a brand?
list.cn: 你能帮我推荐一个品牌吗?

list.en: Do you have sunglass for ladies?
list.cn: 你们有女士用的太阳镜吗?

list.en: It's quite in fashion.
This color suits your complexion.
list.cn: 这种颜色适合你的肤色。

list.en: It is made of pure Chinese silk.
list.cn: 它是用纯中国丝绸做的。

list.en: It looks fabulous.
This hat matches your dress well.
list.cn: 这顶帽子和你的衣服很相配。

list.en: Do you have the dark blue one?
What kind of glasses do you like?
This material is linen.
I want to buy some cleansing milk.
I prefer a natural look.
Do you have the medium size?
Now let's do the eye shadow.
The sleeves seem a bit long.
What size is this skirt?
Do you have the scratch proof lenses?
May I smell the perfume?
You dressed with an individual flair.
This is your size.
How much foreshortening the length?
The shirt is 100% cotton.
Do you do?
This is the right size.
What are the benefits of this mask?
Do you do re-weaving?
Could you change the buttons for me?
list.cn: 你能帮我换一下扣子吗?

list.en: It must be the latest fashion.
Do you have facial cream to go with that?
What style do you want?
Where are my glasses?
Would you like to help me look for any skirts that go with this sweater?
list.cn: 你能帮我找一条和这件毛衣相配的裙子吗?

list.en: Would you like to try our new shampoo and hair conditioner?
list.cn: 您想试试我们的新洗发水和护发素吗?

list.en: This color looks a bit too loud.
list.cn: 这个颜色看起来有点太鲜艳了。

list.en: Is your skin sensitive?
Is this the latest fashion?
Does this color of lipstick suit me well?
list.cn: 这种颜色的口红适合我吗?

list.en: I want to look at these silk dresses.
list.cn: 我想看看这些丝绸连衣裙。

list.en: Do you have this an extra large?
This is waterproof lipstick.
May I have a look at this gold necklace?
list.cn: 我可以看看这条金项链吗?

list.en: I'm quite interested in your down coats.
list.cn: 我对你们的羽绒服很感兴趣。

list.en: What is your chest measurement?
The quality is beyond my imagination.
What kinds of brooches do you have?
How about this color?
Does this pink shirt match my handbag?
list.cn: 这件粉红色的衬衫和我的手提包相配吗?

list.en: The high style didn't take on for long.
list.cn: 这种高雅的式样流行不了多久。
